mapper.select: SELECT id, employ_num, emplloyee_name, status, creation_date, update_date FROM ym_riewer r WHERE r.status = #{status}
SELECT id, employ_num, emplloyee_name, status, creation_date, update_date FROM ym_riewer r

SELECT p.phone, p.blacklist, p.source, p.create_date, c.card_num, c.`name`, c.birthday, c.address, r.id, r.per_id, r.qq_num, r.email, r.usuallyaddress, r.education, r.marry, r.getchild, r.profession, r.monthlypay, r.business, r.busi_province, r.busi_city, r.busi_address, r.busi_phone, r.relatives, r.relatives_name, r.rela_phone, r.society, r.soci_phone, r.society_name, r.update_date, r.sync, q.meaning AS source_value, v.meaning AS relatives_value, w.meaning AS society_value FROM ym_person AS p LEFT JOIN ym_card AS c ON p.id = c.per_id LEFT JOIN ym_private AS r ON p.id = r.per_id LEFT JOIN ym_code_value AS q ON p.source = q.code_code AND q.code_type = 'register_source' LEFT JOIN ym_code_value AS v ON r.relatives = v.code_code AND v.code_type = 'relatives' LEFT JOIN ym_code_value AS w ON r.society = w.code_code AND w.code_type = 'society' where p.id = #{_parameter}

SELECT l.id, l.borr_num, t.maximum_amount, v.meaning, r.repay_date, IFNULL((SELECT amount FROM ym_per_coupon WHERE id = l.per_coupon_id),0) amount, l.makeborr_date, p.product_name, bm.description, bm.is_manual, CASE WHEN l.borr_status='BS010' THEN to_days(CASE WHEN l.act_repay_date is null THEN now() ELSE l.act_repay_date END)- to_days(l.planrepay_date) WHEN l.borr_status='BS006' THEN 0 WHEN l.borr_status='BS004' THEN 0 WHEN l.borr_status='BS005' THEN to_days(curdate()) - to_days(l.planrepay_date) ELSE 0 END bedueDays FROM ym_borrow_list AS l INNER JOIN ym_product AS p ON l.prod_id = p.id INNER JOIN ym_product_term AS t ON p.id = t.product_id INNER JOIN ym_code_value AS v ON l.borr_status = v.code_code AND v.code_type = "borr_status" LEFT JOIN ym_repayment_plan AS r ON l.id = r.contract_id LEFT JOIN ym_borrow_manual as bm on bm.borr_id = l.id WHERE l.per_id = #{_parameter} ORDER BY l.id DESC

SELECT b.bank_num, b.`status`, l.bank_name, b.creation_date, b.sub_contract_num, l.type, b.id, b.phone, c.meaning AS status_name FROM ym_bank AS b INNER JOIN ym_bank_list AS l ON b.bank_id = l.id LEFT JOIN ym_code_value AS c ON b.`status` = c.code_code AND c.code_type = 'bank_status' WHERE b.per_id = #{_parameter}

SELECT c.per_id AS perId, z.image_type AS imageTypeZ, z.image_format AS imageFormatZ, z.image AS imageZ, f.image_type AS imageTypeF, f.image_format AS imageFormatF, f.image AS imageF, c.id AS id, z.image_url AS image_urlZ, f.image_url AS image_urlF FROM ym_card AS c INNER JOIN ym_image AS z ON c.card_photoz = z.id INNER JOIN ym_image AS f ON c.card_photof = f.id WHERE c.per_id = #{_parameter} AND c.id = (SELECT MAX(c.id) FROM ym_card AS t WHERE t.per_id = #{_parameter})
SELECT i.id AS id, i.image_type AS imageType, i.image_format AS imageFormat, i.image AS image, i.image_url AS imageUrl FROM ym_image i WHERE i.image_url is NULL ORDER BY id asc LIMIT #{0},#{1};
